other_title: Ryōjoku no Machi - Kyōen no Ceremony (Japanese)
凌辱の都市 〜狂宴のセレモニー〜 (Japanese)
plot: A young princess, Lady Beatriche, is set up to marry an evil king—Franchesco Chency—so that two nations may have a truce and advoid war, but that is broken when King Francheso betrays the truce and starts a war and takes over the land he tricked his way into getting.
